articles.title: What to know about the Air India plane crash that killed more than 240 people - AP News
articles.description: The Air India plane crash this week was one of India’s worst aviation disasters, killing 241 people on board and several people on the ground. The Air India plane crashed after takeoff Thursday in the northwestern city of Ahmedabad. The crash was the first of…
articles.content:
AHMEDABAD, India (AP) The Air India plane crash this week was one of Indias worst aviation disasters, killing 241 people on board and several people on the ground.
Indian authorities said Friday the… [+5646 chars]
